CheckTitle: Checks if S3 buckets are configured to accept only SSL requests. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an S3 bucket allows non-SSL requests.
Description: Checks if S3 buckets are configured to accept only SSL requests. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if an S3 bucket allows non-SSL requests.
Risk: Allowing non-SSL requests to S3 buckets can expose sensitive data to interception and man-in-the-middle attacks. Enforcing SSL requests ensures data is transmitted securely.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that S3 buckets are configured to accept only SSL requests
